data.comment: Text to show on the radio button when selected urgent.

data.name: WithdrawConfirmation
data.value: 是否确定要撤销此请求?
data.comment: Text to show on withdraw request action in ticket detail card in 1:1 chat.

data.name: WithdrawRequestActionText
data.comment: Text to show on withdraw button in Request submitted card.

data.name: WithdrawText
data.value: 已撤销您的请求 {0}。如果出现其他问题，请发出新的请求。
data.comment: Text to show End User Notification when requets is submitted.

data.name: Yes
data.comment: Text to show yes in confirmation card.

data.name: ContentText
data.comment: Text to show in EndUser welcome card.

data.name: NewRequestBulletPoint
data.value: * 点击此聊天中的 **新请求** 按钮或键入 **新请求**。
data.comment: Text to show command in a welcome card.

data.name: NewRequestButtonText
data.comment: Text to show in Edit task module,new request card.

data.name: WelcomeCardContent
data.value: 遇到问题? 我可以请求待命团队进行调查。
data.comment: Text to show bot description in welcome card for EndUser.

data.name: WelcomeCardTitle
data.comment: Text to show in welcome card.

data.name: WelcomeSubHeaderText
data.comment: Text to show as a sub header in welcome card.

data.name: AssignToMeActionChoiceTitle
data.comment: Text to assign a ticket to himself.

data.name: ChangeStatusButtonText
data.comment: Text to show change status on button.

data.name: ChatTextButton
data.comment: Text to show chat button for EndUser.

data.name: CloseActionChoiceTitle
data.comment: Text to show Close action in Change status section.

data.comment: Text to shown title for First observed in ticket card.

data.comment: Text to show in change status section in SME request details card.

data.comment: Text to show in change status section in SME request details card.

data.comment: Text to show in Request details card for Expert Team

data.name: SeverityButtonText
data.comment: Text to show severity on button in request details card.

data.comment: Text to show under request submitted card to SME.

data.name: SmeUserChatMessage
data.comment: Text to show when SME user try to chat with Enduser.

data.name: UnassignActionChoiceTitle
data.comment: Text to show in change status dropdown choice in request details card.

data.name: EndUserNotificationText
data.value: 支持团队已收到你的请求 # {0}。
data.comment: Text to show EndUser notification when request is submitted.

data.name: SmeAssignedStatus
data.comment: Text to show notification as assigned request is closed to SME Users.

data.name: SmeClosedStatus
data.value: 状态已由 {0} 更改为已解决。
data.comment: Text to show notification as request is closed to SME Users.

data.name: SmeSeverityStatus
data.value: 严重程度已由 {1} 更改为 {0}。
data.comment: Text to show notification when request changes severity from SME Users.

data.name: SmeUnassignedStatus
data.value: 状态已由 {0} 更改为未分配。
data.comment: Text to show notification when request is unassigned to SME Users.

data.name: ManageExpertsActionText
data.comment: Text to show on button

data.name: OnCallSMEDetailCardText
data.value: 这是当前通话的团队。单击 * * 管理 * * 以更改团队中的专家。
data.comment: On call SME detail card text.

data.name: UpdateHistoryActionText
data.comment: Text to show on button

data.name: DatetimeTitleText
data.comment: Text to show on update history card title

data.name: NameTitleText
data.comment: Text to show on update history card title

data.name: NoOnCallExpertsConfiguredText
data.value: 当前没有人在通话中。选择 **管理** 以向待命团队添加专家。
data.comment: Text to show when no on call support experts are configured

data.name: ManageExpertsTitle
data.value: 在此处管理待命专家列表
data.comment: Text to show in manage experts page shown in task module

data.name: NoUpdateHistoryText
data.value: 没有待命历史记录可用。
data.comment: Text to show when no update history is available.

data.name: ErrorMessage
data.value: 出现错误。请几分钟后重试。
data.comment: Generic error message.

data.name: AssignedTicketUserNotification
data.value: 支持团队已收到您的请求 #{0}。专家将很快与你联系。
data.comment: Text to show notification for user when ticket is assigned to expert team.

data.name: ClosedTicketUserNotification
data.value: 已解决此具有票证编号 {0} 的请求。如果仍然需要帮助，请发出新的请求。
data.comment: Text to show user notification message when ticket is closed by Expert Team.

data.name: EscalateButtonText
data.comment: Text to show on button in EndUser ME.

data.name: ReopenedTicketUserNotification
data.value: 我们正在更改处理你的请求的人员。我们将尽快通知你。
data.comment: Text to show user when status of ticket is reopened by Expert team member.

data.name: RequestActionTicketUserNotification
data.value: 支持团队更改了请求的严重级别 {0}。
data.comment: Text to show user when severity of ticket is changed by Expert team member.

data.name: DateValidationText
data.comment: Text to show if issue date is greater than enter date of is empty.

data.name: DescriptionValidationText
data.comment: Text to show if description field is empty.

data.name: TitleValidationText
data.comment: Text to show if title field is empty.

data.name: GroupName
data.comment: Text to use as a group name when group is created.

data.name: MessageContent
data.value: 你好，团队，我需要立即支持 {0} 创建的请求。你能提供帮助吗?
data.comment: Text to show when user clicks on chat button.

data.name: InvalidTeamText
data.value: 尚未为此团队添加此聊天机器人
data.comment: Text to show validation in ME when it is not a valid team to open request.

data.name: ExpertNameTitle
data.comment: Text to show on manage experts page

data.name: AddButtonText
data.comment: Text to show on add button.

data.comment: Text to show in expert list dropdown placeholder.

data.name: ExpertList
data.comment: Text to show on list of experts from command list.

data.name: ExpertListTitle
data.comment: Text to show on manage experts page.

data.name: NoMatchesFoundText
data.comment: Text to show when there are no matches to condition.

data.name: SaveButtonText
data.comment: Text to show on save button.

data.name: OnCallExpertMentionText
data.value: 通话专家列表已被修改。已添加 {0}。

data.name: MaxOnCallExpertsAllowedText
